comments.body: indent a bit more so that the identifiers line up
the grid left padding and grid top padding should be added before the column/row offsets, since they come first. Adding the numbers "in order" makes this easier to understand.
i would have expected half the columnSpacing to be applied to each column's width unless there's only one column in which case it would not be applied.
actually that's not right either. half the column spacing applied to the first and last column, and the whole spacing to the interior columns. but still no spacing if there's only one.

The GridSpecification's tileWidth and tileHeight values include the row and column spacing, even if there's only one column. This makes things work out nicely but it's a little confusing. I've added some doc to GridSpecification that hopefully clarifies things.
